data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
Backward steps are the opposite way of facing forward. Forward steps are oriented horizontally. Walking backwards is the opposite way of facing forward. So, the answer is No.

The person who is going back toward right will walk to the beginning. The person tot moving forward is the first person to walk back. Thus, the answer is No.
